references.paper_title: Program of thoughts prompting: Disentangling computation from reasoning for numerical reasoning tasks
references.reason: This work introduces Program of Thoughts (PoT) prompting, a crucial methodology for integrating computation into reasoning, which ReTool builds upon.

references.paper_title: DeepSeek-r1: Incentivizing reasoning capability in llms via reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper showcases a reasoning model trained with reinforcement learning and its architecture, directly influencing ReTool's development.
This paper introduces program-aided language models, similar to the concept of tool-integrated learning by ReTool.
This paper presents the integration of Reasoning with Reinforced Fine-Tuning, impacting how ReTool enhances reasoning through RL.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting that enhances the reasoning capabilities of LLMs, thus a foundational concept for ReTool.
